resources.string: Let empty to use the default directory (\"/Android/data/com.syberkeep.pdfboard/\"). Enter the path to your desired folder on your sdcard. The path must begin and end with \"/\" like \"/Download/PDF/\". If the desired directory does not exist, it will be generated automatically.
Open via the system settings the app info of the app. There you can, depending on your Android version, manage several things (Storage, network traffic, permissions, â€¦).
Changelog, help, license, used libraries and more.
